item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 5, 2025 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:

27. Blur Busters Open Source Display Initiative – Refresh Cycle Shaders (73 points | 29 comments)

29. Sailor Poets Take over U.S. Navy Deck Logs on New Year's Day (60 points | 10 comments)
